extendedInfo.description: Defend the ancient city from many incoming menaces!Baxal Tower Defense is a must have game for your android device, it has a very carefully planned gameplay with many challenging levels. Can you get perfect score?*THIS IS A LIMITED VERSION (DEMO)*FEATURES (COMPLETE VERSION)- A totally new and original mayan tower defense game- 13 challenging levels, each level has a boss.- +30 different enemies- Five upgradable towers- Campaign and survival modes- 3 different difficulties to overcome- Help with how to play and description of each towerBAXAL Tower Defense!PLAY it before the END!In case of problemsIf you experience any problem or bug, please send us a mail to darian.studios@gmail.com we will solve it as fast as posible.CONTACTdarian.studios@gmail.comhttp://www.facebook.com/pages/Darian-Studios/495443903804232https://twitter.com/darianstudioshttps://plus.google.com/111638691400996913374/posts

reviews.title: A so so start for game
reviews.comment: Opening screen menu design is great. Cute simple tower icons ok. Animations bad. Bad guy animations very bad. One sound effect for placing tower. Music track annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User
